26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_core_client.c,v 1.3 2018/08/27 07:36:07 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include <core/client.h>
30#include <core/device.h>
31#include <core/notify.h>
32#include <core/option.h>
33
34#include <nvif/class.h>
35#include <nvif/event.h>
36#include <nvif/unpack.h>
37
38struct nvkm_client_notify {
39 struct nvkm_client *client;
40 struct nvkm_notify n;
41 u8 version;
42 u8 size;
43 union {
44 struct nvif_notify_rep_v0 v0;
45 } rep;
46};
47
48static int
49nvkm_client_notify(struct nvkm_notify *n)
50{
51 struct nvkm_client_notify *notify = container_of(n, typeof(*notify), n);
52 struct nvkm_client *client = notify->client;
53 return client->ntfy(&notify->rep, notify->size, n->data, n->size);
54}
55
56int
57nvkm_client_notify_put(struct nvkm_client *client, int index)
58{
59 if (index < ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify)) {
60 if (client->notify[index]) {
61 nvkm_notify_put(&client->notify[index]->n);
62 return 0;
63 }
64 }
65 return -ENOENT;
66}
67
68int
69nvkm_client_notify_get(struct nvkm_client *client, int index)
70{
71 if (index < ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify)) {
72 if (client->notify[index]) {
73 nvkm_notify_get(&client->notify[index]->n);
74 return 0;
75 }
76 }
77 return -ENOENT;
78}
79
80int
81nvkm_client_notify_del(struct nvkm_client *client, int index)
82{
83 if (index < ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify)) {
84 if (client->notify[index]) {
85 nvkm_notify_fini(&client->notify[index]->n);
86 kfree(client->notify[index]);
87 client->notify[index] = NULL;
88 return 0;
89 }
90 }
91 return -ENOENT;
92}
93
94int
95nvkm_client_notify_new(struct nvkm_object *object,
96 struct nvkm_event *event, void *data, u32 size)
97{
98 struct nvkm_client *client = object->client;
99 struct nvkm_client_notify *notify;
100 union {
101 struct nvif_notify_req_v0 v0;
102 } *req = data;
103 u8 index, reply;
104 int ret;
105
106 for (index = 0; index < ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify); index++) {
107 if (!client->notify[index])
108 break;
109 }
110
111 if (index == ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify))
112 return -ENOSPC;
113
114 notify = kzalloc(sizeof(*notify), GFP_KERNEL);
115 if (!notify)
116 return -ENOMEM;
117
118 nvif_ioctl(object, "notify new size %d\n", size);
119 if (nvif_unpack(req->v0, 0, 0, true)) {
120 nvif_ioctl(object, "notify new vers %d reply %d route %02x "
121 "token %"PRIx64"", req->v0.version,
122 req->v0.reply, req->v0.route, req->v0.token);
123 notify->version = req->v0.version;
124 notify->size = sizeof(notify->rep.v0);
125 notify->rep.v0.version = req->v0.version;
126 notify->rep.v0.route = req->v0.route;
127 notify->rep.v0.token = req->v0.token;
128 reply = req->v0.reply;
129 }
130
131 if (ret == 0) {
132 ret = nvkm_notify_init(object, event, nvkm_client_notify,
133 false, data, size, reply, &notify->n);
134 if (ret == 0) {
135 client->notify[index] = notify;
136 notify->client = client;
137 return index;
138 }
139 }
140
141 kfree(notify);
142 return ret;
143}
144
145static int
146nvkm_client_mthd_devlist(struct nvkm_object *object, void *data, u32 size)
147{
148 union {
149 struct nv_client_devlist_v0 v0;
150 } *args = data;
151 int ret;
152
153 nvif_ioctl(object, "client devlist size %d\n", size);
154 if (nvif_unpack(args->v0, 0, 0, true)) {
155 nvif_ioctl(object, "client devlist vers %d count %d\n",
156 args->v0.version, args->v0.count);
157 if (size == sizeof(args->v0.device[0]) * args->v0.count) {
158 ret = nvkm_device_list(args->v0.device, args->v0.count);
159 if (ret >= 0) {
160 args->v0.count = ret;
161 ret = 0;
162 }
163 } else {
164 ret = -EINVAL;
165 }
166 }
167
168 return ret;
169}
170
171static int
172nvkm_client_mthd(struct nvkm_object *object, u32 mthd, void *data, u32 size)
173{
174 switch (mthd) {
175 case NV_CLIENT_DEVLIST:
176 return nvkm_client_mthd_devlist(object, data, size);
177 default:
178 break;
179 }
180 return -EINVAL;
181}
182
183static int
184nvkm_client_child_new(const struct nvkm_oclass *oclass,
185 void *data, u32 size, struct nvkm_object **pobject)
186{
187 return oclass->base.ctor(oclass, data, size, pobject);
188}
189
190static int
191nvkm_client_child_get(struct nvkm_object *object, int index,
192 struct nvkm_oclass *oclass)
193{
194 const struct nvkm_sclass *sclass;
195
196 switch (index) {
197 case 0: sclass = &nvkm_udevice_sclass; break;
198 default:
199 return -EINVAL;
200 }
201
202 oclass->ctor = nvkm_client_child_new;
203 oclass->base = *sclass;
204 return 0;
205}
206
207static const struct nvkm_object_func
208nvkm_client_object_func = {
209 .mthd = nvkm_client_mthd,
210 .sclass = nvkm_client_child_get,
211};
212
213void
214nvkm_client_remove(struct nvkm_client *client, struct nvkm_object *object)
215{
216#ifdef __NetBSD__
217 if (object->on_tree) {
218 rb_tree_remove_node(&client->objtree, object);
219 object->on_tree = false;
220 }
221#else
222 if (!RB_EMPTY_NODE(&object->node))
223 rb_erase(&object->node, &client->objroot);
224#endif
225}
226
227bool
228nvkm_client_insert(struct nvkm_client *client, struct nvkm_object *object)
229{
230#ifdef __NetBSD__
231 struct nvkm_object *collision;
232
233 collision = rb_tree_insert_node(&client->objtree, object);
234 if (collision != object)
235 return false;
236 object->on_tree = true;
237 return true;
238#else
239 struct rb_node **ptr = &client->objroot.rb_node;
240 struct rb_node *parent = NULL;
241
242 while (*ptr) {
243 struct nvkm_object *this =
244 container_of(*ptr, typeof(*this), node);
245 parent = *ptr;
246 if (object->object < this->object)
247 ptr = &parent->rb_left;
248 else
249 if (object->object > this->object)
250 ptr = &parent->rb_right;
251 else
252 return false;
253 }
254
255 rb_link_node(&object->node, parent, ptr);
256 rb_insert_color(&object->node, &client->objroot);
257 return true;
258#endif
259}
260
261struct nvkm_object *
262nvkm_client_search(struct nvkm_client *client, u64 handle)
263{
264#ifdef __NetBSD__
265 return rb_tree_find_node(&client->objtree, &handle);
266#else
267 struct rb_node *node = client->objroot.rb_node;
268 while (node) {
269 struct nvkm_object *object =
270 container_of(node, typeof(*object), node);
271 if (handle < object->object)
272 node = node->rb_left;
273 else
274 if (handle > object->object)
275 node = node->rb_right;
276 else
277 return object;
278 }
279 return NULL;
280#endif
281}
282
283int
284nvkm_client_fini(struct nvkm_client *client, bool suspend)
285{
286 struct nvkm_object *object = &client->object;
287 const char *name[2] = { "fini", "suspend" };
288 int i;
289 nvif_debug(object, "%s notify\n", name[suspend]);
290 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify); i++)
291 nvkm_client_notify_put(client, i);
292 return nvkm_object_fini(&client->object, suspend);
293}
294
295int
296nvkm_client_init(struct nvkm_client *client)
297{
298 return nvkm_object_init(&client->object);
299}
300
301void
302nvkm_client_del(struct nvkm_client **pclient)
303{
304 struct nvkm_client *client = *pclient;
305 int i;
306 if (client) {
307 nvkm_client_fini(client, false);
308 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(client->notify); i++)
309 nvkm_client_notify_del(client, i);
310 nvkm_object_dtor(&client->object);
311 kfree(*pclient);
312 *pclient = NULL;
313 }
314}
315
316#ifdef __NetBSD__
317static int
318compare_object_nodes(void *cookie, const void *va, const void *vb)
319{
320 const struct nvkm_object *oa = va;
321 const struct nvkm_object *ob = vb;
322
323 if (oa->object < ob->object)
324 return -1;
325 if (oa->object > ob->object)
326 return +1;
327 return 0;
328}
329
330static int
331compare_object_key(void *cookie, const void *vo, const void *vk)
332{
333 const struct nvkm_object *o = vo;
334 const u64 *k = vk;
335
336 if (o->object < *k)
337 return -1;
338 if (o->object > *k)
339 return +1;
340 return 0;
341}
342
343static const rb_tree_ops_t nvkm_client_objtree_ops = {
344 .rbto_compare_nodes = compare_object_nodes,
345 .rbto_compare_key = compare_object_key,
346 .rbto_node_offset = offsetof(struct nvkm_object, node),
347};
348#endif
349
350int
351nvkm_client_new(const char *name, u64 device, const char *cfg,
352 const char *dbg, struct nvkm_client **pclient)
353{
354 struct nvkm_oclass oclass = {};
355 struct nvkm_client *client;
356
357 if (!(client = *pclient = kzalloc(sizeof(*client), GFP_KERNEL)))
358 return -ENOMEM;
359 oclass.client = client;
360
361 nvkm_object_ctor(&nvkm_client_object_func, &oclass, &client->object);
362 snprintf(client->name, sizeof(client->name), "%s", name);
363 client->device = device;
364 client->debug = nvkm_dbgopt(dbg, "CLIENT");
365#ifdef __NetBSD__
366 rb_tree_init(&client->objtree, &nvkm_client_objtree_ops);
367 rb_tree_init(&client->dmatree, &nvkm_client_dmatree_ops);
368#else
369 client->objroot = RB_ROOT;
370 client->dmaroot = RB_ROOT;
371#endif
372 return 0;
373}
